solver.distributedMemory.placement

Class GenericPlacementSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • solver.Z3Context
      • solver.Z3Solver
        • solver.distributedMemory.placement.GenericPlacementSolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommunicationCostConstraints, SolverFunctions

    public class GenericPlacementSolver
extends Z3Solver
implements CommunicationCostConstraints
    Generic placement solver which maps a group of SDF actors to a cluster on target platform.
    Author:
    Pranav Tendulkar

      • ifElseDistanceCalculation

        public void ifElseDistanceCalculation()
        Generate if then else statements such that if group1 is on cluster 1 and group2 is on cluster 2 then distance between them is x-units.

      • moduloDistanceCalculation

        public void moduloDistanceCalculation()
        This works only for Mesh platforms. Assume we number all the clusters from 0 to 15. Then we can calculate the distance between two clusters by simple arithmetic calculation. This methods does it assuming mesh network.
